description:
Includes three exclusive skins for Sylas’s Unchained Mode. Content includes:
- Crimson Sylas Skin
- Fallen Sylas Skin
- Prismatic Sylas Skin

All three skins will unlock after the Sacred Woods mission. Equip the skins in the Settings menu.

The Unchained Skins Pack is included with the The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story™ Deluxe Edition.
name: The Mageseeker: Unchained Skins Pack
